approveSubscription(address,address,uint.details: Approves a subscription for the specified token, publisher, and index.

params.token: The address of the super token.

returns._0: bool A boolean indicating whether the operation was successful.

calculateDistribution(address,address,ui.details: Calculates the distribution of tokens for a given publisher, index, and amount.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to distribute.
params.token: The address of the super token.

returns.actualAmount: The actual amount of tokens which will be distributed.
returns.newIndexValue: The new value of the index.

createIndex(address,uint32,bytes).details: Creates a new index for the specified token.

params.token: The address of the super token.

returns._0: bool A boolean indicating whether the operation was successful.

deleteSubscription(address,address,uint3.details: Deletes a subscription for the specified token, publisher, index, and subscriber.

params.token: The address of the super token.

returns._0: bool A boolean indicating whether the operation was successful.

distribute(address,uint32,uint128,bytes).details: Distributes a specified amount of tokens according to the specified index.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to distribute.
params.token: The address of the super token.

returns._0: bool A boolean indicating whether the operation was successful.

getIndex(address,address,uint32).details: Retrieves information about the specified index for a given publisher.

params.token: The address of the super token.

returns.exist: A boolean indicating whether the index exists.
returns.totalUnitsApproved: The total number of approved units.
returns.totalUnitsPending: The total number of pending units.

getPublisherId(address,uint32).details: Computes the ID of a publisher based on the publisher's address and index ID.

getSubscription(address,address,uint32,a.details: Retrieves information about the specified subscription for a given token, publisher, index, and subscriber.

params.token: The address of the super token.

returns.pendingDistribution: The amount of tokens pending distribution for the subscription.
returns.units: The units value of the subscription.

getSubscriptionByID(address,bytes32).details: Retrieves information about the specified subscription based on its ID.

params.token: The address of the super token.

returns.pendingDistribution: The amount of tokens pending distribution for the subscription.
returns.units: The units value of the subscription.

getSubscriptionId(address,bytes32).details: Computes the ID of a subscription based on the subscriber's address and publisher ID.

listSubscriptions(address,address).details: Lists all subscriptions of a subscriber for the specified token.

params.token: The address of the super token.

returns.indexIds: The IDs of the indexes for the subscription.
returns.unitsList: The unit amount for subscriptions to each index.

revokeSubscription(address,address,uint3.details: Revokes a subscription for the specified token, publisher, and index.

params.token: The address of the super token.

returns._0: bool A boolean indicating whether the operation was successful.

updateIndex(address,uint32,uint128,bytes.details: Updates the value of an existing index for the specified token.

params.indexValue: The new value of the index.
params.token: The address of the super token.

returns._0: bool A boolean indicating whether the operation was successful.

updateSubscriptionUnits(address,uint32,a.details: Updates the subscription units for the specified token, index, subscriber, and units.

params.token: The address of the super token.

returns._0: bool A boolean indicating whether the operation was successful.
